cause.description:
The Canadian National Institute for the Blind is a voluntary, non profit rehabilitation agency that provides services for people who are blind, visually impaired and deafblind.
1. Encourage research for the cause of the blind
2. Support the organization in it's amazing work
3. Show support and understanding to the blind, visually impaired and deafblind
cause.mission: Show support and understanding to the organization and it's members
cause.name: CNIB - The Canadian National Institute for the Blind
